title: PRS ‘Biki’ Oberoi: A legend in his own lifetime
description: Prithvi Raj Singh Oberoi, the legendary hotelier, passed away at 94, leaving behind an extraordinary legacy. As the son of Rai Bahadur Mohan Singh Oberoi, he surpassed expectations, shaping their surname into India's premier international luxury brand. His towering personality and expertise defined understated, world-class service standards, enlightening many about luxury and class.
